sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SUPERFETATION, in medicine, a ſecond or after-conception, happening when the mother, already pregnant, conceives of a latter coition ; ſo that ſhe bears at once two foetuſes of unequal age and bulk, and is delivered of them at different times. We meet with inſtances of ſuperfetations in Hippocrates, Ariſtotle, Du Laurens, &c. : but they are ſaid to be much more frequent in hares and swine.
